item.description: After years of managing VM templates manually, I switched to using Cloud-init to automate network configuration, user management, and repository setup when deploying new VMs.

item.description: How I solved the problem of restricting developer access to specific workspaces using chroot and Linux ACLs, preventing users from accessing files outside their designated directories.
